Articles.Content:
Hah! You think yourself absolute? If reality is wrapped in a shell of greater reality, the aggregate must too be itself wrapped in further reality. Where does it stop, you ask? At the end of your vision.

I cast off the foolish search for great truths and hold the tangible cookie close.

The wind blows it away though.

Im not taking it, its all dirty, and I don't know if anybody washed their hands!
Under the sun, the dirt gets solid, cracks and crumbles aside the noone's clean cookie.
I bake a new cookie after washing my hands

My Seagulls come and steal the cookie.

Mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine

I steal the cookie and lead the seagulls through the sails of a sailboat.

my cookie

The seagulls break through the boat, swarm you, and steal the cookie.

Mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine---okay I'll stop now.

The Woodpeckers' Guild juridically persecutes the seagulls and confiscates the cookie as a reparation.

Edited March 27, 2017 by kerbiloid
I bake a new cookie and bring it to the International Space Station
Apogee engine fails. Suborbital cookie falls.
I catch the ashes. My ashes.

A bunch of seagulls---

--Mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine minemine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine mine---

ahem...a bunch of seagulls steal the ashes and peck all who oppose them. Then they bring it to me.

My cookie atoms.

TRAPPIST-1 comes to life and vaporizes you. i sift through the core and grab the atoms.

 

my atoms. (and @ProtoJeb21 atoms.)

Edited March 27, 2017 by Bill the Kerbal
Synthesizing a monomolecular cookie. You no more need to gather atoms. Though no more can bite the cookie.

I bake a new cookie and eat it.

my delicious cookie

Edited March 27, 2017 by 53miner53

I go down your esophagus and grab what is left of the cookie.

My squishy, half-melted cookie

I steal your cookie paste before you do anything with it. Then, I put the stuff into a mold in -50 degrees Celsius. 

My frozen cookie.

I take your cookie. I then decide that the cookie is to gross and throw it into the sun. 

I bake a new cookie. My cookie.

I steal your cookie with a jet plane and a robot arm.

my cookie

I "wash" the cookie and eat it.

Yum!

I decide to not do what @ProtoJeb21 did and bake a batch of cookies and put them in the fridge for later after eating one.

My 11 cookies.
The fridge was secretly a robot, which, after you put "your" cookies in, runs away and gives me the cookies.

I snatch the cookies from your hands and shove them into my mouth.

Mmmmmmmmmmmm!

The seagulls come for the cookies.

Your keep-the-cookie tech is no match for the memes. Their cookies.
They land on my house, where I take the cookies and put them in my fridge which is defended with laser cutters too small for the seagulls to get through.
